privacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPage.intro: At EK DIGITAL, SOCIEDAD LIMITADA, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
privacyPage.section1Content: EK DIGITAL, SOCIEDAD LIMITADA, located at 191 Calle Clot, Barcelona, 08027, Spain, is the controller of your personal data.
privacyPage.section2Content: We may collect the following types of information: name, email address, phone number, and any other information you voluntarily provide through our contact forms.
privacyPage.section3Content: We use your data to: respond to your inquiries, provide you with information about our services, manage the business relationship, and comply with our legal obligations.
privacyPage.section4Content: The processing of your data is based on your express consent, the execution of a contract, or compliance with legal obligations.
privacyPage.section5Content: We will retain your data for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected and to comply with our legal obligations.
privacyPage.section6Content: You have the right to access, rectify, delete, limit processing, port your data, and object to processing. You can exercise these rights by contacting us at info@ekdigital.eu.
privacyPage.section7Content: For any questions regarding this policy, you can contact us at info@ekdigital.eu or at our postal address.

cookiesPage.title: Cookie Policy
cookiesPage.intro: This cookie policy explains what cookies are, how we use them, and your choices regarding their use.
cookiesPage.section1Content: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit a website. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently and provide information to site owners.
cookiesPage.section2Content: We use the following types of cookies: essential cookies (necessary for site operation), performance cookies (help us understand how visitors interact with the site), and functionality cookies (remember your preferences).
cookiesPage.section3Content: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly. They include cookies that allow you to navigate the site and use its features.
cookiesPage.section4Content: We use analytics tools to understand how visitors use our site. This information helps us improve our website and your browsing experience.
cookiesPage.section5Content: You can control and manage cookies through your browser settings. Please note that disabling certain cookies may affect the functionality of this website.
cookiesPage.section6Content: For more information about how we manage your privacy, please see our Privacy Policy or contact us at info@ekdigital.eu.
